Class Maxim.FXChain

java.lang.Object
  Maxim.FXChain
Enclosing class:
Maxim
public class Maxim.FXChain
extends java.lang.Object

An audio FX chain providing a filter and a delay unit. Normally, you'd not need to access this directly, as it is part of the AudioPlayer etc. classes for simplicity.
